entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 6:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind light except north 70 km/h gusting to 90 over southern sections. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Rain beginning late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind light except north 70 km/h gusting to 90 over southern sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind light except north 50 km/h gusting to 70 over southern sections early in the evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
